title: Did Mia Khalifa ‘Expose’ Ajit Pai After He ‘Slid Into Her DMs’?
subtitle: Rumors that the former adult actress confronted the Federal Communications Commission chairman on Instagram after he tried to send her flirty direct messages originated in a hoax article.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Social media personality Mia Khalifa insulted Federal Communications Commission chairman Ajit Pai after he messaged her on Instagram.
